a.span: Links to Iowa Star Conference Schools

font.marquee: Please see the COVID-19 Information section for important information regarding the April 8th board meeting and a change in the meal schedules.

div.p:
Please check here for the most recent information on this rapidly changing situation. The Tripoli Administration will post what information and plans they have to this section of the website. Thank you for your patience and understanding in these challenging times.
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic and related proclamations by the government agencies regarding gathering sizes, the April 8th, 2020 school board meeting . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Tripoli COVID-19 Information

div.p: Tripoli Community Schools is an equal opportunity institution and will not discriminate on the basis of actual or perceived age, color, creed, national origin, race, religion, marital status, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, physical attributes, physical or mental ability or disability, ancestry, political party preference, political belief, socioeconomic status, or familial status and which creates an objectively hostile school . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Equal Educational Opportunity

div.h4: ....we wouldn’t ask if we didn’t want it
div.p:
You may have noticed this graphic at the bottom of some articles but do you know why it is there?
When you see it, it means you are invited to give feedback on that article. We don't ask for feedback on every article so, when you see it, know that we are truly seeking your input. PLEASE take advantage of the opportunity. How does it work?
When you see this area, click on Provide feedback on this . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about GIVE US YOUR FEEDBACK
